venue.address_1: RT103 Child St. and Railroad Av.
venue.name: East bay Bike Path

item.description: Hi All  THIS RIDE CANCELLED UNTIL SUNDAY SAME TIME AND PLACE!!     This is a afternoon ride ,total 10 miles great for new riders, but the idea is for socializing in Bristol, have some drinks and something to eat, biking kinda secondary, so bring money if your coming!  We will stop at Aidens Irish Pub in Bristol for drinks, food and blarney! Aidens is a well reviewd local bar in the East Bay area, and supposedly have 'real Irish food" and Lots of different Irish beers.   I am opening this meetup to ALL! But remember PLEASE,this is social ride for me, if anyone wants to go fast, please go together and meet me and the rest of group at Aiden's and be nice to the people until the rest of the horde get there!! HA!HA! (I'm a little crazy tonight, full moon, meds not working!)
item.name: RIDE CANCELLED FOR SAT> GOING ON SUNDAY SAME TIME AND PLACE!!
